text: evarkaḷ kañcattaṉam ceytu, maṟṟa maṉitarkaḷaiyum kañcattaṉam ceyyumpaṭi tūṇṭukiṟārkaḷō (avarkaḷukkuk kaṭiṉamāṉa vētaṉaiyuṇṭu. Ākavē, allāhvuṭaiya kaṭṭaḷaikaḷai) evaṉ puṟakkaṇikkiṟāṉō (atu avaṉukkuttāṉ naṣṭattai uṇṭupaṇṇum. Allāhvukku oru naṣṭamum ēṟpaṭātu.) Ēṉeṉṟāl, niccayamāka allāhtāṉ perum cīmāṉ, perum pukaḻuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
